sentences.en: According to the air force, the missile merely impacted with the ground prematurely.
sentences.cn: 根据空军提供的消息，导弹只是提前撞向了地面。

sentences.en: Both Goering and Himmler had acted prematurely, as they quickly found out.
sentences.cn: 戈林与希姆莱两人很快地发现, 他们动手得太早了.

sentences.en: But the face was in the main one face, and every head was prematurely white.
sentences.cn: 但是主要的面孔只有一张, 每一颗头的头发也都过早地白了.

sentences.en: Danny was born prematurely, weighing only 3lb 3oz.
sentences.cn: 丹尼是早产儿，生下来时体重只有3磅3盎司。

sentences.en: Dark night was coming down prematurely.

sentences.cn: 她的头发过早地苍白了。

sentences.en: His hair was prematurely white, but his busy eyebrows were still jet - black.
sentences.cn: 他的头发已经白了, 不过两道浓眉还是乌黑乌黑的.

sentences.en: Holmgren is careful not to celebrate prematurely.
sentences.cn: 霍姆格伦非常小心，以免庆祝得过早了。

sentences.en: If a contestant enters the area prematurely, they must be motioned off.
sentences.cn: 如果选手太早进入场地, 他们必须离开.

sentences.en: If prematurely extinguished, it is not available in Katherine.
sentences.cn: 如果过早熄灭, 则是不详之兆.

sentences.en: Jud and Fred Brasser were both prematurely balding men in their early thirties.
sentences.cn: 贾德和弗雷德·布拉塞尔两人才三十多岁就过早地谢了顶.

sentences.en: Moving existing customers on to higher - priced loans prematurely can strain relations.
sentences.cn: 过早的把现有的顾客转移到高价位的贷款会使双方的关系变得紧张.

sentences.en: She was born prematurely with poorly developed lungs.
sentences.cn: 她早产,肺部未发育健全.

sentences.en: That causes your test to terminate prematurely, too, of course.
sentences.cn: 当然，那也将导致你的测试过早地终止。

sentences.en: The heavy rain driving against the windows made the room prematurely dark.
sentences.cn: 暴雨敲打着窗户，房间早早就暗了下来。

sentences.en: The law could arrest the development of good research if applied prematurely.
sentences.cn: 如果草率施行，该法律将会阻滞高质量研究的进展。

sentences.en: The war and the years in the harsh mountains had prematurely aged him.
sentences.cn: 战争和在环境恶劣的山区度过的岁月使他过早衰老了。

sentences.en: Yet as any programmer knows, it would be a mistake to optimise prematurely.
sentences.cn: 正如任何程序员所知道的那样，过早地优化可能是一个错误。

words.tran_cn: 早产的；不成熟的；比预期早的
早产儿；过早发生的事物
